item.title: Level 2 arrives, as does the Budget: All you need to know about today's news
item.description: The Government's Budget has contained the single biggest spending package in New Zealand's history, as the country welcomes in alert level 2 with another day of no new coronavirus cases. Get all the important ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

item.title: Experts: Overseas travel won't return until 2023

item.title: The $50 billion Budget to help save 140,000 jobs - and wage subsidy extended
item.description:
The Government will spend a mammoth $50 billion on its Covid-19 recovery plan in a bid to save almost 140,000 jobs nationwide, according to this year's Budget.
It's the single biggest spending package ...
